pullrequest.title: [A-1] Support for removing entities in the Sensor system

content.raw:
This fixes compilation for me, but the tests are not generated :cry: I'm using Nvidia docker...

~~~
diff -r 37f3fbf6699e test/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/CMakeLists.txt       Fri Feb 08 14:50:26 2019 -0800
+++ b/test/CMakeLists.txt       Fri Feb 08 15:08:12 2019 -0800
@@ -78,7 +78,7 @@
       if(NOT GL_FAIL_RESULT)
         message(STATUS " + found a valid dri display (pyopengl)")
         set(VALID_DRI_DISPLAY TRUE)
-      else()
+      elseif(${GL_ERROR})
         # Check error string: no python module means no pyopengl
         string(
           FIND ${GL_ERROR} "ImportError: No module named OpenGL.GLUT" ERROR_POS
~~~
content.html:
This fixes compilation for me, but the tests are not generated I'm using Nvidia docker...

diff -r 37f3fbf6699e test/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/CMakeLists.txt       Fri Feb 08 14:50:26 2019 -0800
+++ b/test/CMakeLists.txt       Fri Feb 08 15:08:12 2019 -0800
@@ -78,7 +78,7 @@
       if(NOT GL_FAIL_RESULT)
         message(STATUS " + found a valid dri display (pyopengl)")
         set(VALID_DRI_DISPLAY TRUE)
-      else()
+      elseif(${GL_ERROR})
         # Check error string: no python module means no pyopengl
         string(
           FIND ${GL_ERROR} "ImportError: No module named OpenGL.GLUT" ERROR_POS
